long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate vaporwave ａｅｓｔｈｅｔｉｃ text with this chrome extension!

Press the extension's icon on the top right corner of the browser to open the popup. Type in the text want vaporwavized and press "ｇｅｎｅｒａｔｅ", the ａｅｓｔｈｅｔｉｃ version is now copied and in your clipboard!

OR

Select some text on the browser, right click and select "Vaporwavise", the ａｅｓｔｈｅｔｉｃ version is now copied and in your clipboard!
